text: Ronald Lee "Ron" Wyden (born May 3, 1949) is the senior United States Senator for Oregon, serving since 1996. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He previously served in the United States House of Representatives from 1981 to 1996. ==Other websites== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Stanford University alumni Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:United States senators from Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Wichita, Kansas Category:Lawyers from Portland, Oregon Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon
title: Ron Wyden
